Topic.Title: The 4 Dow Stocks With the Fastest-Growing Dividends....

Message.Msg: "Not to forget the 2:1 stock split 10 years ago " At least do your research before blabbering like a idiot. Microsoft has split nine times since going public. The stock split 2-for-1 on September 18, 1987, April 12, 1990, May 20, 1994, December 6, 1996, February 20, 1998, March 26, 1999, and February 14, 2003. The stock also had two 3-for-2 splits on June 26, 1991 and June 12, 1992.
